Summary My first experience as a Project Coordinator was mostly acting on the web market as Web Production Lead at IBM. I was responsible for important IBM Web related Projects Management, such as: System Z, Tivoli Pulse and WebSphere Business Process Management. 
Attending weekly meetings composed by the global team for scope, budget and risk analysis definition. Utilization of the conception described on the PMBoK(PMI). All the written documentation and meeting were held in English. That scenario gave me the opportunity to practice the use of English daily.  
Later on, I have performed as a Project Analyst at the bank JP Morgan Chase. At the bank I was responsible for the Requirement analysis, writing technical and Business documentation (Business Requirement Documentation and Functional Documentation). Data analysis and report creation. Also performed project activity updates held in some of the most well-known corporate tools (Sharepoint, Clarity, Excel) and helped in the software test elaboration related to the financial area - more specifically Cash Equities. Took part in Trainings at Bovespa - SINACOR and participate in the follow up and comprehension of the complete Trading process (Front, Middle and Back Office) to implement projects for the operational enhancement of the bank.  
Most Recently, I have worked as Business Analyst at Atos Origin.There, I achieved actively on the identification of problems and opportunities through survey requirements, observations and full contact with users and developers; Expertise in generating specification documents and reports. Functional coordination and business to define strategies. Mapping processes for improvements at the firm. Skill in conducting training on systems. Elaboration of Status Reports for internal and external purposes. Process improvement, analysis and definition of solutions refinement of requirements, functional and technical specifications, supported the test team. Responsibilities Skills:

* Manage Sponsor Relationship 
* Reviews requests 
* Provides WBS estimates 
* Provides due dates 
* Indicates task complexity 
* Assigns task to the appropriate queue 
* Indicates priority / visibility 
* Indicates if optional pre-QA Sponsor review applies to tasks

* Expands the business 
* Consults 
* Participates in tools / system testing as needed
